des: "I use this instead of a sauce for roast beef and steaks.  It can be made ahead of time, so prep can be cut at dinner time.  It will last for several days in the refrigerator."
ins: In a small bowl, cream butter with an electric mixer.  Mix in lemon juice, tarragon, black pepper, and shallot.  Season to taste with salt. Chill for at least 1 hour.
